__e: Well, that line to Phoenix cut out about 40 minutes ago.
Phoenix come to me right there in the state pen.
That Phoenix car is fast. Too fast.
You tell your daddy, if he makes me mad enough... I'll come down to Phoenix and wash him out.
And two years from now, you'll be back in Phoenix replaying this very moment over and over again in your mind and realizing it was the beginning of the end.
All my friends are back in Phoenix and this town has a weird smell that you're all probably used to but I'm not.
